title: What Would Your AOL Screenname Be?

questions.text: What do you do right after logging into AOL?

options.text: Change your font to hot pink Comic Sans
A dark rose with dripping glitter 🌹✨
A random fruit and your birth year

questions.text: Your friend just logged off without saying bye. What do you do?

options.text: Write a cryptic away message about it...
Message their crush something wild from their account 😈

results.emo: 💔 Your screenname is xXSweetAngel420Xx — you're full of feelings, mystery, and dramatic away messages.
results.chaotic: 🔥 Your screenname is H8rSlayer69 — you bring the chaos, the caps lock, and the AIM drama.
results.y2k: ✨ Your screenname is BubblezNGlitter — you're pure Y2K sparkle with a side of sass and pink pixels.
results.emo+chaotic: 🖤 Your screenname is XxRebelSoulxX — a dangerously hot blend of angst and mischief.
results.emo+y2k: 🌸 Your screenname is GlitterTears13 — emotional, aesthetic, and always extra.
results.chaotic+y2k: 💿 Your screenname is BratzKillazzz — part Bratz doll, part unhinged, all style.
results.emo+chaotic+y2k: 👑 Your screenname is AIMQueenOfChaos — you're the entire buddy list experience in one unholy screenname.
